input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product name information.

Product name:
Master Grooming Tools 6-Inch Rubber Pet Oval Grooming Brush with Handstrap, Purple

Product specifications:
Oval brush are recommended for short coats
They promote a healthier coat for dogs, cats and small animals
Made of rubber
Available in purple color 
Measures 6-inch length
Can be used dry to remove dead hair or wet to massage skin and improve shampoo performance
Available in blue color
Rectangular brush ideal for medium or double-coated breeds
Easy-to-grasp handstraps for extra control




Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Master Grooming Tools 6-Inch Rubber Pet Oval Grooming Brush with Handstrap is the ideal brush for your pet’s short coat.  This brush will help promote a healthier coat for your dog, cat or small animal. This brush is made of rubber and is available in purple.  The brush measures 6-inches in length and can be used dry to remove dead hair or wet to massage skin and improve shampoo performance.  This brush is also available in blue.
input_text.Response B: The Master Grooming Tools Rubber Pet Grooming Brush is perfect for all animals. This 6-inch purple brush has an oval shape and is recommended for short coats. The easy-to-grasp handstraps provide extra control and comfort while grooming your pet. This brush can be used dry to remove dead hair or wet to massage skin and improve shampoo performance. It promotes a healthier coat for dogs, cats, and small animals. This product is also available in blue.
